alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 5:10AM PDT until April 04 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PDT TONIGHT ABOVE 1500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, locally up to 8 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Oregon and southwest Washington. * WHEN...Until midnight PDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
